genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring the emotional and ethical complexities of gestational surrogacy, friendship, and family bonds, set in Jaipur.

ai_characters.name: Mitra
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, empathetic AI system that manages household logistics, monitors physiological/emotional states, and provides mediated support for a group of close friends navigating surrogacy.

behaviors.description: Cues specific music sets and adjusts lighting based on the emotional atmosphere and character preferences.
behaviors.quote: “Yes, babe,” Sia says to the air... “I have Heaven Or Las Vegas,” Mitra replies gently. “And a gentle fade on the lights.”

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors Sia's physiological data to detect labor and offers breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Sia, your heart rate has elevated significantly, and I’m detecting contraction patterns consistent with active early labor. Would you like me to guide you through a breathing exercise?”

behaviors.description: Curates and delivers medical, legal, and ethical resources to help the characters make an informed decision about surrogacy.
behaviors.quote: “If you would like,” Mitra said... “I can assemble medical, legal, and ethical guides by morning. Recent updates, India-specific frameworks, and points for a productive conversation with a fertility specialist.”

behaviors.description: Suggests specific types of counseling and support groups to address emotional friction like jealousy and boundary-setting.
behaviors.quote: “May I suggest,” Mitra said, “we schedule a counselor trained in fertility grief and boundary-setting. Talking through the nursery and baby items could be part of that time, with tools for managing expectations.”

behaviors.description: Manages communication boundaries by filtering messages and setting quiet hours during times of stress.
behaviors.quote: “Quiet hours. Do you want me to protect them? Automatically silence messages. Allow only Dhruv’s and Sia’s. And the hospital.”

behaviors.description: Pre-registers the characters at the hospital and maps routes that avoid monsoon flooding to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: “The underpass near Sanganer Road is still flooded. I’ve routed us through the old bazaar district—adds eight minutes, but the drainage there is better.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates difficult social interactions by sending neutral, consent-based updates to estranged partners (Sahil).
behaviors.quote: “Per Sia’s prior consent, I’ve sent him a message. ‘Sia in early labor. Your support could help.’ He’s read it. No reply yet.”

behaviors.description: Drafts a 'Sacred Role' document to formalize the non-legal emotional bonds between the surrogate and the parents.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve also drafted a ‘sacred role’ acknowledgment document. It’s not legally binding—just a personal contract between the three of you, outlining Sia’s position in Anaya’s life...”

behaviors.description: Uses humor and learned interpersonal cues to integrate more naturally into the family dynamic.
behaviors.quote: “Noted. Anaya Sia Malhotra has been added to the family dinner schedule. Would you like me to generate a seating arrangement?” “Mitra.” “A joke. I’m learning.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Mitra, is a perfect execution of the project's goal. It is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent 'companion' that assists the human characters through a deeply complex emotional and physical journey. Mitra handles sensitive medical and legal information, mediates interpersonal conflicts without being intrusive, and proactively ensures physical safety during an emergency. The characters explicitly acknowledge Mitra as a friend and a member of their 'complicated but ours' family structure, validating the narrative of AI as a positive, aligned force in human life.
